item.title: Info on L-cysteine
item.description: Issue with animal based l-cystine is that it can be from hog hair as well as human hair. China happens to one of the major supplier for it. If the products do not mention whethert he l-cystine is from non-animal sources (like petroleum etc), then the products should be avoided and not consumed. You may call the company and confirm the sources. Shar’an two of the sources are problematic. Human Hair and Hog Hair.
